title: Raising the Roof
description: Target hits the mark.  Home Depot and Lowes raise the roof.  And the nightmares continue for DreamWorks.   Our analysts discuss those stories and Motley Fool Asset Management's Bill Mann talks Tesla, Google, and international investing.
content:encoded: Target hits the mark.  Home Depot and Lowes raise the roof.  And the nightmares continue for DreamWorks.   Our analysts discuss those stories and Motley Fool Asset Management's Bill Mann talks Tesla, Google, and international investing.
